activities:
Ingredion Incorporated (f/k/a Corn Products International, Inc.), may receive and otherwise process personally identifiable information about employees of its affiliated companies in the European Union for purposes of:
compensation, including stock plan administration and compensation analysis; payroll processing; performance management; succession planning; benefits and personnel administration, such as administration of bonuses, pensions, and severence plans; monitoring and enforcing compliance with company policies and procedures; and global reporting of headcount to support business operations.
eucountries: Czech Republic, France, Germany, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
